overview: Norwegian industrial rock musician Stephan Groth--better known as Apoptygma Berzerk--stars in this 90 minute collection of concert footage, music videos, behind-the-scenes footage, and more Apoptygma Berzerk - The Harmonizer DVD DVD. Also included is a bonus music CD of "Unicorn" EP, which includes several versions of the track "Unicorn" (from the HARMONIZER album), a cover of The Cure's "A Strange Day."
title: Apoptygma Berzerk: The Harmonizer DVD
